name: A Doll's House
description:
A fresh perspective on a literary touchstone.

Nora appears to be the perfect wife, but beneath the surface she harbours a secret that threatens to unravel her seemingly happy world. As the truth emerges, Nora gradually awakens to her own desires, and the play builds toward a radical act of self-liberation.  

In this crisp, strikingly modern adaptation, Artistic Director Brendan Healy (Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf, The Inheritance) revitalizes another groundbreaking classic, making it more immediate, intimate, and electrifying than ever with an extraordinary ensemble of Canadian acting talent.

name: A Soulful Wintry Evening With Kurdish Kamﾄ］cha
description:
A vibrant image of kurdish musical themes under the mysterious power of winter will be reverberated on Shahriyar Jamshidi's solo kamﾄ］cha and vocal performance. 

If you are enthusiastic about listening to the pure tastes of diverse musical ethnicities from West Asia, especially Greater Kurdistan, rather than the mainstream musical themes, melodies and languages of Persian and Turkish, this unique Kurdish Kamanche and vocal recital is for you! 

You can immerse yourself in the beauty of Kurdish traditional music and leave the melodies and rhythms to transport you to the mesmerizing feeling of being in the mountains of Kurdistan, which are covered with oak and pistachio trees.

The Kurdish-Canadian, kamﾄ］che player, composer, vocalist and award winner, Shahriyar Jamshidi will be performing improvisation pieces, his compositions and epic Kurdish vocal songs on his Kamﾄ］che and singing those lyrical tunes.

name: Echoes of an Era featuring Lisa Fischer, Eddie Henderson, Javon Jackson, Orrin Evans, John Patitucci

location.name: Koerner Hall, Royal Conservatory of Music

description:
A reimagining of the classic album by RnB legend Chaka Khan and Chick Corea featuring the original drummer and Koerner Hall favourite, Lisa Fischer.

Echoes of an Era was a stunning jazz album released in 1982, featuring Chaka Khan, Chick Corea, Freddie Hubbard, Joe Henderson, Stanley Clarke, and Lenny White. With timeless standards like "All of Me," "I Hear Music," and "I Loves You, Porgy," this project showcased Chaka's incredible versatility as a vocalist and earned her a Grammy nomination in the jazz category.

After the concert, enjoy a beverage and more music!

name: Klezmer Instrumental: Playing for Yiddish Dance
description:
In this instrumental workshop, Martin Van de Ven will teach klezmer tunes for Yiddish folk dancing. 

Emphasis will be placed on playing in a way that supports and responds to dancers' tempo for an enjoyable experience. Workshop participants will have the opportunity to take a Yiddish dance workshop. This workshop is geared towards intermediate musicians who know how to play their instrument but all levels are welcome to join. 

No previous Klezmer experience necessary.

name: Jamaica in January 2026
description:
We're back! Let the food, the music, the laughter, the community spirit, it's the kind of energy that helps you brave winter.

New this year, we are hosting a celebration of resilience and unity. 

Enjoy our Bingo Jamdown style, a twist on a classic favourite with tons of prizes to be won and all the high-energy fun you expect.

Indulge in food from jerk to curry goat, oxtail to Trini Doubles, Rum Cake, Ginger Beer, Sea Moss. 

Shop the marketplace for island finds, let Irie vibes lift you up.

Everyone welcome. Sign Up. Show Up. Spin di Wheel. WIN nuff prizes.

name: Secund: Klezmer Rhythm on the Fiddle
description:
In Klezmer, the fidl or violin isn't just a melody-hogging diva, in the traditional "fidl kapelye" (fiddle band), it can be a rhythm instrument too! 

Join Jon Cannon, former member of the fiddle-heavy Klezmer ensemble Ezekiel's Wheels, for a workshop that will help you play your violin as a rhythm and chord support instrument in Klezmer and Klezmer-like music. Teaching will focus on violin, but all instruments are welcome.
